options.content:
LifePO4 4s 12v Solar Battery for Wyze camera USB power

Wyze Camera system consisting of 4 6ah LifePo4 cells.
  • 1 x 20W panel
  • DALY 30A 12V BMS>
  • Renogy Wanderer 10a Li solar charger
  • Raspberry Pi Zero connected via RS232
  • DHT-11 Temp/Humidity Sensor
  • Reporting via Prometheus and Grafana 7
